attributes.action: Bring in a law to make a curfew for children aged 16 and under,10pm weeknight's & 11pm weekend's & school holiday's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would discourage children from hanging around on street corners at night making a newsence of themselves,and could be enforced by fineing their parents or guardians thus making them more responsible for their children.
